rules_text: Whenever a creature dies, choose one that hasn't been chosen this turn between deathtouch, lifelink, menace, or vigilance. This creature gains that ability until end of turn.
notes:
ARTed

choose one that hasn't been chosen this turn

Whenever a creature dies, choose one that hasn't been chosen this turn —
• This creature gains deathtouch until end of turn.
• This creature gains lifelink until end of turn.
• This creature gains menace until end of turn.
• This creature gains vigilance until end of turn.
